Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Server

Class ServerConnection

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.ControllerClasses.Observable<Action>
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Server.ServerConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer<MessageToClient>, java.lang.Runnable
public class ServerConnection
extends Observable<Action>
implements java.lang.Runnable, Observer<MessageToClient>
ServerConnection is a thread running on the server that manages connection to and from the clients. For the messages to be sent a manual flushing has to be performed!

  • Constructor Details

    • ServerConnection

      public ServerConnection​(Server server, java.net.Socket client) throws java.io.IOException
      Default constructor for a ServerConnection class. Tries to establish a connection to a client after it has contacted the server. Given the socket it creates the outputStream, the corresponding ObjectOutputStream and vice versa for the InputStream and the ObjectInputStream. If unable an IOException is caught and the connection is closed.
      Parameters:
      client - The socket Server-Client
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Implemented Run method of the Runnable Interface. Defines, using a ServerMessageHandler object, the sequence through which a Client, connected to the Server, has to go through to effectively initiate a new Game to be played.

      The order of communications is divided as follows:

      1. The Client is asked to input his name and the number of players (if he is the first who connected)
      2. The Client enters a Lobby where he can decide whether e wants to start the game or modify the game parameters
      3. Once all Clients are connected and ready to start, the Initial Phase of the game begins
      4. The actual game then follows the standard Masters Of Renaissance rules.
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable

    • update

      public void update​(MessageToClient message)
      Overridden method of the Observer Interface.

      It sends a message whenever an action is executed bu the ActionController.

      Specified by:
      update in interface Observer<MessageToClient>
      Parameters:
      message - MessageToClient to be sent to the client.

      public void send​(RedLeaderCard[] leaderCards)

    • waitReady

      public void waitReady()
      Method used for synchronization purposes between different Server-Client connections.

      It works buy stopping the caller Thread until all players are ready to proceed to the next phase of the game.

      public void disconnected()
      Updates the Model about a disconnection and if the player who disconnected was CURRENTLY playing, uses the Server to broadcast a message to all Clients so that the next player can start his turn.
